title: Deoghar ropeway accident was a disaster waiting to happen: Here's why
selftext:
Out of the three dead, two people were killed during the rescue operation. While one man fell from one of the Indian Airforce choppers, another woman died after the rope which was being used to rescue her broke. 
Typical finger pointing and blame game started after the accident.
comments: Please dont do anything that is remotely dangerous in india - sky diving, paragliding, ropeway. Shit qc standards and max corruption
That's fine but this list should at least not include the Air Force and Rescue Operators.
